Package com.hanggrian.pinview

Class PinView

java.lang.Object
android.view.View
android.view.ViewGroup
android.widget.LinearLayout
com.hanggrian.pinview.PinView
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent
public class PinView extends android.widget.LinearLayout
Container of PinEditText that has been modified to operate like TextView.

      Parameters:

    • setGap

      public void setGap(@Px int gap)
      Changes the gap of each pins, will ignore negative number and pins must be at least 2 to take effect.
      Parameters:
      gap - gap size in pixel.

    • getGap

      @Px public int getGap()
      Returns the gap of each pins, regardless of whether or not it takes effect.
      Returns:
      gap of each pins.
